CustomField.formula: CASE(Case_Type__c, "PSR Team",0.5, "Allocation Changes",0.5, "Ownership Change",0.5, "Clean Up Pipeline",3, "Dashboard / Report Request",1, "Email Library",0.5, "Implementation List",2, "List Request",2, "Operations Project",1, "Retention Meeting Action Item",2, "Salesforce Audit",2, "Salesforce Bug Fix",2, "Salesforce Development",2, "Survey Edit/Issue",0.5, "Offboarding Process",0.5, "Account Page Update",0.5, 0)
CustomField.label: Case Points
